Despite how long it's been out for, it is quite an addictive game.
Wait till you get one hit by some idiot with an AWP sniper who then calls you NOOOOB - no thanks...
Honestly, game sucks. Just remove all guns and make it zeus only then I'll play.

A very addictive and thrilling game! But hackers
are killing it and making it toxic.  Otherwise A Good Game to Spend Quality Time With Friends.
El mejor juego de estrategia grupal para jugar con amigos.
Excelente jogo, passa 500 horas jogando fácil, porém pcs ultrapassados tipo meu sofrem para o jogo rodar.
No te puedes enojar con este juego, es basicamente una puta adiccion.

Está bueno para jugar con amigos pero...

Por más de que cada tanto troleamos un poco, a ellos y seguro que a mi también, les cayó vac por usar programas de terceros aunque nunca lo hicimos. El ban debió ser por molestar, no por usar cheats.

En síntesis, el sistema de baneo es una verdadera basura que saca del juego a quienes juegan de forma legal.

Por las dudas mis amigos tenían 900 y 350 horas respectivamente si no me equivoco. Horas que se desperdiciaron gracias a este mal sistema.

Encima ahora es peor todavía porque si un compañero se va durante una partida en competitivo te deja totalmente vendido, ya que ahora ni siquiera podés agarrar los bots, gracias valve. Hiciste de un buen juego algo totalmente tóxico y aberrante.
A lot of trolls and russians players, kałaszki lepsze od lemów/suprimów. 1300h dobiera nowe konta generalnie jebać tą gre. idzcie lepiej na esea albo faceit
It's a fun game i would give it a try.
been playing this game for 4 years and im still in silver 10/10
good game, but too many cheaters so valve can make more money...

If you like getting so much better at a game that you can stomp all over children relentlessly, you'll like this game.  Skill in this game makes you win more, which is against the grain in games nowadays.  In general the developers listen to the community and improve the game.  That's a lot coming from developers these days.  Most every time you'll play you'll get somebody spouting anti-semitic (probably a 6 year old) but that adds to the game's charm.

The fact that Counter Strike is still popular and played to this day says more than enough about its quality.
The game is fair, balanced, and skill based.
No matter if you are new player or veteran, if you want to enjoy team based FPS with old school feeling and new decent graphics, this game is for you.
Comp is really good when you get 4 of your buddies to join you. I can also shoot my friend in the back of the head with a .338, so would recommend.
I LIKE THIS GAME IS VERY FUN!
The aiming on this game is strictly worse than CS:Source. I'm going back to play that instead. :(
todo piola, menos por los brazucas y chilenos
